lantern.tooltip.place_lantern: Right click on a block to place the lantern in the world
lantern.tooltip.open_gui: Sneak + right click in the air to open the lantern gui
lantern.tooltip.toggle_lantern: Right click in the air to toggle the lantern on/off
lantern.tooltip.create_lantern_boat: Sneak + right click the lantern on a boat to apply the lantern to a boat
